Everyday practical home automation projects

Projects created

with open source hardware and software

Capsicum

ongoing since April 2022

🫑 Retrofit a wired doorbell to add WiFi and make it smart 🔔

power AAA
wireless WiFi
sensor bell
mcu ESP32
How to build it

Oak

completed July 2022

🌳 Outdoor LoRa-GPS tracker with E-Ink display 🔑

power 18650
wireless LoRa
sensor GPS
mcu SAMD21G18
bom cost USD $78.93
bom items 82
battery life 14 hours
How to build it

Pine

completed September 2020

🌲 Indoor Infrared receiver and transmitter with temperature sensor 🎐

power AA
wireless Infrared
sensor Temperature
mcu SAMD21G18
bom cost USD $9.71
bom items 49
How to build it

Palm

completed July 2019

🌴 Outdoor BLE-connected UV sensor keychain 🗝

power 380mAh LiPo
wireless BLE
sensor UV Index
mcu nRF52
bom cost USD $50.56
bom items 13
battery life 5 days
How to build it

Cactus

completed May 2019

🌵 Indoor WiFi-connected temperature and humidity sensor 🍶

power 2000mAh LiPo
wireless WiFi
sensor Humidity
mcu ESP8266
bom cost USD $26.00
bom items 36
battery life 1 month
How to build it
